DataElement.preferredName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Investigator Previous Clinical Study Participating Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no question related to the previous participation and experience of the PEARL network, an infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients, investigator in a clinical study.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Investigator Previous Clinical Study Participating
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the previous participation and experience of the PEARL network, an infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients, investigator in a clinical study.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Investigator
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.:a researcher in a clinical trial or clinical study.

Concepts.longName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network
Concepts.definition: An infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.

An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring prior to something else.:A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical trial.:Taking part in an activity.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
The act of taking part in an activity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: groups, institutions, or clinical facilities that conduct clinical research or tests, or analyze clinical data.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
